Text: I forgot to mention his game is damn hungry :/ Probably requires the latest mac with high end ATI graphics. Basically unplayable on my 2010 MBP 15".

Doubt it. This may be the 'Official Native Version' but unfortunately it is far from optimised. When you start up the game or enter a level first you have to wait for the loading stutter to finish. Then with my 256mb GT330 it runs at about 10fps. I'm guessing you will need a 2012/2013 iMac or 17" MBP to run this game with any amount of smoothness. I may try and port this myself.. Wouldn't be surprised if I achieved better performance then this official one! ;p
This is terrible "Official Native version" ever.. Theres a wrapper made by someone better than this "Official Native version"
giraldie: could you link to that wrapper? the only wrapper ive seen is on portingteam and it has no sound. i might try to port myself..
if anyone gets good fps can you please let me know ur specs via comment so i can let others know thx
@ryballs I forget where I download. But the file name is Dungeon_Defenders_macosx_cw...
